column1: GOAL & PRIORITY TRACKER - Business Now by Loud Legacy
Instructions: Set quarterly goals, break them into monthly milestones, and track weekly priorities.
STATUS OPTIONS: Not Started | In Progress | On Hold | Completed | Cancelled
Use this to decide what to work on when everything feels important
Priority Score Formula: (Impact x Urgency) / Effort
1. Limit to 3 major goals per quarter - focus beats breadth
2. Make goals specific and measurable - 'grow revenue' vs 'add $5K MRR'
3. Break goals into monthly milestones - big goals need small steps
4. Review weekly - adjust tactics not goals
